HexCell
MonoBehaviour
public
HexCell

This class determines the characteristics of a single hexagonal cell in the grid.

Variables
coordinates
public HexCoordinates coordinates

The cell's coordinates in the hex grid.

worldPosition
public Vector3 worldPosition

The cells exaxt position in the scene.  Rendered obsolete by the Position variable.

units
public List<HexUnit> units

The amount of units present in the cell.

unitsInCell
int unitsInCell
Functions
UnitEnters
public void UnitEnters(
HexUnit unit
)

Reacts when a unit enters the cell. If more than one unit is present their positions will be offset so that they do not overlap, as long as there are no more than five units in the same cell.

Parameters
unit
HexUnit

The unit currently entering the cell.

UnitEnters

Reacts when a unit leaves the cell. The remaining units, if any readjust their positions.

Parameters
unit

The unit currently leaving the cell.

UnitLeaves
public void UnitLeaves(
HexUnit unit
)

get 
}

Returns the position of the cell's transform.

Position

Added just to make the code work with how the tutorial was written not so necessary, since we do not feature heighdifferences and such in our version of the hex map project.

Left in because I have not figured out how to leave it out yet.

uiRect
public RectTransform uiRect
cellIconPrefab
public Image cellIconPrefab

This variable holds the icon image for the cell, if any.

chunk
public HexGridChunk chunk

This variable keeps track of which grid chunk the cell belongs to.

Color
public Color Color {
get;
set 
}

this keeps track of the cell's color.

color
Color color
icon
Image icon
HasTown
public bool HasTown {
get;
set 
}

This variable tracks whether a cell has an icon on it Currently the only available icon is the town icon

If a town icon is set on the cell, this variable's setter instantiates a prefab icon, and sets on top of the cell.  The setter also can remove the town icon, when needed.

hasTown
bool hasTown
neighbors
[SerializeField]
HexCell[] neighbors
Functions
GetNeighbor
public HexCell GetNeighbor (
HexDirection direction
)

This function returns the neighboring cell, if one exists, in a particular direction.

Parameters
directions

The direction in which the method looks for a neighbor.

Returns

The neighboring cell in the requested direction.

SetNeighbor
public void SetNeighbor (
HexDirection direction,
HexCell cell
)

This function records the neighbors of the current cell into an array.

Parameters
directions

The direction in which the method looks for a neighbor.

cell
HexCell

The cell that will be set as a neighbor to the current cell.

RemoveTown
public void RemoveTown()

This function removes a town icon from the cell.

Refresh
void Refresh ()

Because the cell's color is created in the HexMesh, this method calls the refresh method of the grid chunk, which in turn retriangulates the chunk.
